resources.string: Main screen contains All songs on the device and a footer that shows current playing music. To do this app needs to get permission to access files by adding <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> to AndroidManifest.xml file

This screen displays the current song that is being played and its details with music controls using MediaPlayer library. Media player is a java library that handles media. docs: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/media/MediaPlayer.html

This screen displays songs with the option to buy them via In app billing services provided by google adding permission via <uses-permission android:name="com.android.vending.BILLING" /> to AndroidManifest.xml file and integrating it using doc: https://developer.android.com/google/play/billing/billing_integrate.html

This screen allows you to download the song bought which is later added to playlist of songs on the device. Downloading song to the device will require Write external memory permission which can be done by adding <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> to AndroidManifest.xml file
